The students will be furnished with integrated knowledge, discovering a better way towards professional communication, developing more common sense and never losing themselves in this information-explosive age. With a solid basis on humanity and liberal ideology, they are sure to find a more complete picture of human life.

description.zh: 本課程主要在培養各類型段落、短文的撰寫能力，包括描寫、敘述、說明及議論性質文章。
description.en: This course is intended for university-level EFL writing students with the aim of increasing their fluency in English writing. To achieve this goal, students in this course will have ample opportunities to write varying types of English paragraphs, for instance, paragraphs of definition and paragraphs focusing on cause and effect relationships. In addition, they will have plenty of opportunities to write various kinds of short English essays, including descriptions, narratives, and argumentative writings.

name.en: Reading and Discussions on Global Affairs

description.zh: 本課程旨在幫助學生經由閱讀與討論以了解全球共同面對的課題，包括：全球化的趨勢、文化衝突與恐怖主義、全球貧富差距、環境保護問題、基因工程所衍生的倫理道德問題等等。
description.en: Through reading and discussions, the students are guided to understand some of the most important issues that have affected the present world and its future.  These topics include globalization in world economy, health care problems, environmental protection, racial conflicts, and genetic engineering.

description.zh: 本課程旨在訓練學生公開表達之能力，內容包括語言表達基本原則與技巧、肢體語言與演講要領，備題演講及即席演講演練。
description.en: This course is designed to enable students to develop the principles and skills necessary for public speaking. Included will be guidelines for giving a speech and displaying body language, and practices for prepared speech and impromptu speech.

description.zh: 本課程介紹研究方法和論文寫作知識，期能培養學生獨立研究和撰寫學術報告、論文的基本能力。主要分為三部份：（一）研究內涵與步驟,（二）主要的研究方法,（三）如何撰寫英文論文及報告。涵蓋主題包括：運用圖書館資源選擇研究主題、研究計劃的撰寫、問卷調查法、訪問法、觀察法、田野工作研究方法、文獻資料分析法（內容分析法）、個案研究法、相關研究法、實驗法、文學研究法，研究報告論文格式與寫作要領，如何撰寫文獻探討，參考書目寫法等。
description.en: This course aims at providing students with the fundamental knowledge and competence that they will need in doing research and writing research papers.  Its main purpose is to familiarize students with methods, procedures, and techniques that are applicable to quantitative and qualitative research as well as to improve their ability to write research papers.  The main topics for instruction include: the research process; major research methods; and the structure of a research paper.  The research methods primarily studied include the experimental method, descriptive research, ethnography, case study, observation, survey research (questionnaire and interviews), content analysis/documentary analysis, and critical approaches to literature.

description.zh: 本課程重點為（一）為簡淺明確的商用英文、（二）與時並進的國際經濟貿易實務，內容涵蓋法律、外匯與銀行、倉儲運輸，國際金融、國際行銷學、廣告學、包裝學、海上保險及度量衡。
description.en: This course acquaints students with present-day commercial English and trade practice, the content of which includes Laws, Foreign Exchange and Banking, Warehousing and Transportation, International Financing, International Marketing, Advertising, Packaging, Marine Insurance and Weights and Measures.

description.zh: 本課程之設計是用來發展現代各種英語教學法之理論與實務。
description.en: This course is designed to develop understanding principles, current practices and skills of the methods used in the teaching of English.

description.zh: 本課程使學生具有基礎日語能力，並加強會話及閱讀能力訓練。
description.en: The focus of this course is to enable students to have basic Japanese abilities and to strengthen the training or drilling of conversation and reading comprehension of the Japanese language.

description.zh: 本課程使學生具有基礎法語能力，並加強會話及閱讀能力訓練。
description.en: The focus of this course is to enable students to have basic French abilities and to strengthen the training or drilling of conversation and reading comprehension of the French language.

description.zh: 本課程使學生具有基礎西班牙語能力，並加強會話及閱讀能力訓練。
description.en: The focus of this course is to enable students to have basic Spanish abilities and to strengthen the training or drilling of conversation and reading comprehension of the Spanish language.

description.zh: 本課程使學生具有基礎德語能力，並加強會話及閱讀能力訓練。
description.en: The focus of this course is to enable students to have basic German abilities and to strengthen the training or drilling of conversation and reading comprehension of the German language.

description.zh: 本課程介紹心理學理論，並探討如何應用心理學於英語教學，以提昇學生學習動機和自我學習、自我反思能力。
description.en: This course aims at introducing major theories of educational psychology and exploring their relevance to teaching and learning English as foreign language.   Besides, psychological ideas and theories dealing with motivation and concerned with developing students into reflective, autonomous learners will be discussed.

description.zh: 以對流行事物，如電影，音樂，廣告，服裝，電視，通俗小說等，在當代文化思潮中的影響，及其所扮演角色探討為經，並對於英語在各範疇中展現之語彙，修辭，語法，技巧之賞析為緯，引領學生進入一個交織著現代語文與現代意涵的世界。
description.en: This course aims at giving an approach to the study of television, popular music, popular literature such as magazines and best sellers, fashion and movies, as well as an examination into the influence of all aspects of our daily lives on our basic beliefs and values. It involves the use of methodologies from both the humanities and the social sciences in the effort to interpret expressive cultural forms. Students are encouraged to participate in discussion over selected topics from contemporary issues.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 本課程以與學生日常生活相關的情境為主題，協助學生建立自然、流利的英語溝通技巧。語程側重訓練學生下列語言能力；(1)重音、縮音、連音、及語調等發音基礎訓練；(2)聆聽大意及特定資訊之能力；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式。本課程使用語言教室視聽器材實施教學。除聆聽錄音教材、配對練習、角色扮演、演說、表演短劇、及小組討論外，並佐以錄影教材，以加強實際演練與師生互動。
description.en:
This training is designated to help students establish
communicative skills through natural and authentic English,
contextualized in lively, interesting situations related to
students' immediate needs. Special focuses will be on
(1) listening for main ideas and for specific information;
(2) pronunciation exercises targeted at important features
of English, such as stress, rhythm, intonation, reduction,
and linking sounds; (3) conversational fluency providing
students with a wide range of useful conversational
expressions.  Classes will be conducted in the language labs,and students will be expected to participate in class
discussions, oral drills after listening to tapes and watching videos.  Lots of interaction with other students either in pairs or in small or large group activities will be emphasized.

description.zh: 本課程承續學生一年級的英文基礎，提供學生更多閱讀機會，並加強閱讀策略指導，以培養學生獨立閱讀、及使用適當英文表達之能力。教材以介紹英語地區文化、思想、及價值觀為主，以協助學生建立世界觀，並培養其批判思考能力。教學活動以團體討論、小組討論、段落與短文習作實施。
description.en: The objective of this course are: (1)to provide the students with abundant reading opportunities based on the students' levels;(2)to introduce various reading strategies to the students so that they may find the optimal strategies to help themselves read independently; and (3)to furnish students with competence in writing. Reading selections will be mainly focused on discussion of the cultures, thoughts and values of the English-speaking world. Students will be able to join activities which encompasses group discussion, small group discussion, paragraph writing and essay writing.

description.zh:
經典是珍貴的世界遺產，是人類文化不朽的標記。無論東方或西方，舉凡任何領域的活動，皆有經典。經典之所以為經典，在於其揭示出永恆的理念，讓人不斷傳承，成為我們思慮云為的起跑點。經典的理念，超越時空限制，具有不可磨滅的參考價值。
本課程旨在教導學生閱讀重要經典，學習如何研讀該經典的方法，以期有系統地瞭解該經典的內涵。因為經典的普世通達，讓我們得以運用共同認知的思想，建立與人溝通的基礎路徑；因為經典的先見之明，讓我們得以運用崇高的智慧，檢視自己，照見生命旅程之中的每一個腳步。
description.en:
Ancient classics-a culturally significant mark for people in every part of the world--are an important heritage for all human civilization as well as for each of the individual ethnic groups that owns them. In Eastern and Western world, there exist a diversity of classics in all fields of activities. Classics are highly recommended just because they point out eternal ideas to follow and they are considered the starting point to think about. The value of Classics increases as they break through the limit of space and time. 
This course teaches the students how to read important Classics so that the learners--as they know better ways to study and do research on Classics-will go into the deeper parts of the Classics more systematically. By studying classics where universal implications are available, we are able to take advantage of the commonly acknowledged principles to build up the fundamentally communicative paths with other people. Besides, since the prophetic visions are omnipresen

description.zh: 本課程的設計以歷史趨勢的闡述及專題研究分析二方面同時進行。課程方面包括中、西歷史觀念的比較與中國歷代政治、經濟、社會、文化的歷史演進，藉以幫助學生認識時代之趨勢與意義。授課方式以口頭講述為主，討論及書面報告為輔，期使學生在短時間內，能對中國歷史有一簡要而清晰的了解，深化學生的歷史感。
description.en: Methodologically, the course is performed in two ways at the same time: interpretation of historical trends as well as the study and analysis of specific topics. The course will cover: comparison of historical concepts and the historical development of a long term of Chinese history in the fields of politics, economics, society and culture so that the students who take this course will sure understand better the trends and significance as the historical time spans go by. Class activities are made up of: lectures, student discussion and paper presentation. The students who take this course will have a brief but clear understanding of the Chinese history in a short time-thus embedding themselves with a deeper sense of history.

description.zh: 提供本校四技學生在本行以外，對其他領域的認識，以彌補其只鑽研專業課程的偏頗，訓練學生整合知識，使不致在知識爆炸的時代中迷失，促進各種專材的溝通，培養共識；培育人文素養，啟發人文關懷，使具有完整的人生觀。
description.en: This course offers a good opportunity for four-year college students in this university to have an easier access to a completely different field of knowledge, in the hope that  students can add their individual professional knowledge and broaden their minds. The students will be furnished with integrated knowledge, discovering a better way towards professional communication, developing more common sense and never losing themselves in this information-explosive age. With a solid basis on humanity and liberal ideology, they are sure to find a more complete picture of human life.

description.zh:
大二上學期為軍訓（三）兩學分選修，在下列三單元中選擇兩者，概述如下：孫子兵法－－使學生了解我國固有兵學思想、戰爭原理、原則及戰爭指導藝術，啟發學生對兵學研究之興趣，增進軍事修養，建立全民國防共識，以維護國家安全。國防科技－－使學生對武器及武器系統與目前世界各國所發展使用的新式武器能作有系統的認識，並對我國獨立自主的國防科技發展成就有所了解，以啟發青年學生參與國防科技研究的興趣。護理與健康－－概述同大一女生部份。
國防科技－－使學生對武器及武器系統與目前世界各國所發展使用的新式武器能作有系統的認識，並對我國獨立自主的國防科技發展成就有所了解，以啟發青年學生參與國防科技研究的興趣。
護理與健康－－概述同大一女生部份。
description.en: Military Training includes three Courses at the first semester of second year. They are Sun Tzu's Art of War, National Defense Technology, Nursing and Health. Sophomores can choice any two of tem. Sun Tzu's Art of War introduces you into new area of thought of war. National Defense Technology affords you a thorough and systematic knowledge of world's high technology weapons. Nursing and Health is a course of teaching you how to take cares your own body and mind.

name.zh: 新聞英語及聽力訓練（一）

description.zh: 本課程利用新聞教材加強英語字彙能力及聽力技巧, 	內容採用電台、報紙、電視的時事、深度報導和全球議題以增強學生英語知識。同時, 學生亦可獲得各種有用的聽力技巧以加強英語聽力。
description.en: This course is designed to increase vocabulary power and develop listening skills in English through up-to-date news. Current events, in-depth reports as well as global issues from radio, newspapers and T.V are provided to enrich the student's English knowledge. Effective listening skills are reinforced to enhance the student's listening comprehension.

description.zh: 本課程旨在進一步加強學生的口語表達溝通之能力，經由合宜的活動設計，如小組討論與英語談話情境的塑造，如面談，學生將獲得充分機會以演練聽講的技巧。
description.en: This course is designed to develop oral communication skills at a higher level.  Stimulating themes and authentic content will be used to engage students and generate lively conversation, such as though-provoking newspaper, magazine articles, and video films. Activities include task-based pair and small-group discussion for maximum practice and personalization.

description.zh: 本課程旨在提昇學生撰寫結構完整段落和短文之能力, 並著重如何重寫、摘要、 轉述、 陳述、筆記、編排、起草、修改等相關技巧。
description.en: This course is expected to expand students' writing capacity and experience by helping them to formulate, organize, and present ideas clearly in well-formed paragraphs and compositions.  Students will learn about rewriting, outlining, paraphrasing, synthesizing, documenting, note-taking, writing the draft and editing their own work.

name.en: British and American Literatures and Cultures

description.zh: 本課程引導學生熟悉變遷中之英美文學作品典律，並探討其形成之歷史文化背景及隨變遷所產生之時代意義。課程中將討論與作品相關之社會、政治、文化、心理、哲學、理論等議題，使學生能瞭解欣賞選讀作品，並銳化其思辯能力及分析技巧。學生須於課前詳讀作品，並於課堂上參與討論。
description.en: This course is intended not only to familiarize students with the evolving canon of British and American literatures, but also to investigate its contextual historical and cultural meanings, past as well as present. It aims to sharpen students' critical thinking ability and analytical reading skills by engaging them to discuss social, political, cultural, psychological, philosophical, and theoretical issues that are relevant to their understanding and appreciation of the selected literary works. Students are required to peruse the assigned weekly readings and participate in class discussion.

description.zh: 本課程涵蓋的主題包含語音，句法，語意，心理語言，社會語言，語言學習等簡介，作為更進一步語言（母語／外語）學習，教學，研究的基礎。
description.en: This course covers the basic ideas on the following sub-topics: phonetics & phonology, syntax, semantics, psycholinguistics, sociolinguistics and language acquisition, serving as a stepping stone for further research on language learning (native or foreign), teaching or other language-related study.

description.zh: 本課程著重於: (1)藉由科技性文章的閱讀來幫助非理工背景之學生了解一般科技性文章之語法、文體與結構組織，(2)幫助學生熟悉技術報告以及科技論文之撰寫。
description.en: The main focus of this course is twofold: (1) to introduce students in non-technical fields with general technical readings that help learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization of technical reports; and (2) to acquaint students with the techniques of technical writing.

description.zh: 本課程旨在引導學生閱讀英美短篇故事，探討其敘事技巧、情節、人物、觀點和語言等，如何在故事中建構意義，並著重故事所傳達的文化意涵。
description.en: This course will guide students to read short fiction written by British and American authors.  By reading a wide range of short stories, we will examine how such narrative techniques as plot, character, point of view and language construct meaning in stories.  We will also examine what these stories tell us about the cultures that produce them.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 本軍訓課程分四學期，大一上學期為軍訓（一）零學分，概述如下：戰爭概論－－使學生了解戰爭的涵義與指導要領，藉以體認「好戰必亡，忘戰必危」的真義，以樹立國防共識，維護國家安全，並增進對國家生存、民族發展的必勝信念。陸軍概要－－使學生了解我國陸軍之沿革、使命、特性、組織體系、教育訓練、情報、作戰、後勤及未來發展，增進對陸軍之認識。
description.en: The military training courses comprise four semesters. During the first semester, there are two subjects which are the War Conception and the Introduction of Army. The War Conception is designed to make student understand the definition of War and the guidelines of the War. By knowing the War, we can realize that the bellicose must lead to destruction, while the ignorant lead to risk, and build the consensus that the National Defense and security is crucial to National survival and development. The introduction of Army is designed to make student understand the army's history, task, character, origination, intelligence, operation, logistics and the future development.

description.zh: 本課程設計重點有三：(1)藉由精選的中級程度教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
description.en: This course is designed (1) to strengthen students' previously required knowledge in English with basic grammatical ideas and sentence patterns reviewed through selected materials at intermediate level; (2) to get the most (gist) out of the reading and appreciate the writing strategy of diverse interests. Focuses will be on explanation of difficult words, phrases, and syntax, as well as on analysis of fostering a basic writing skill; (3) to reinforce the competence and performance of listening, speaking, reading and writing by practice.

description.zh: 本課程以與學生日常生活相關的情境為主題，協助學生建立自然、流利的英語溝通技巧。語程側重訓練學生下列語言能力；(1)重音、縮音、連音、及語調等發音基礎訓練；(2)聆聽大意及特定資訊之能力；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式。本課程使用語言教室視聽器材實施教學。除聆聽錄音教材、配對練習、角色扮演、演說、表演短劇、及小組討論外，並佐以錄影教材，以加強實際演練與師生互動。
description.en:
This training is designated to help students establish
communicative skills through natural and authentic English,
contextualized in lively, interesting situations related to
students' immediate needs. Special focuses will be on
(1) listening for main ideas and for specific information;
(2) pronunciation exercises targeted at important features
of English, such as stress, rhythm, intonation, reduction,
and linking sounds; (3) conversational fluency providing
students with a wide range of useful conversational
expressions.  Classes will be conducted in the language labs,and students will be expected to participate in class
discussions, oral drills after listening to tapes and watching videos.  Lots of interaction with other students either in pairs or in small or large group activities will be emphasized.

description.zh:
國文，是運用本國語言文字，蘊釀於欣賞文藝作品，充實文化內涵，增進思維能力與人文素養的一門課程。
本課程分為大一上學期2學分，大一下學期2學分。大一上學期的授課內容，以文學名篇為範圍；希望藉此擴建學生深入品味文學趣味的能力，鍛鍊靈活的語文敏感度，默契文學創意，甚而嘗試創作。大一下學期的授課內容，以思想名篇為範圍；希望藉此啟發學生透轍分析各家學說思想，漫步哲人的宇宙天地，跟隨哲人的心路歷程，進而念茲在茲，從容內化，共饗取之不盡用之不竭的先驗與風範。
description.en:
"Chinese" is the course where we make full use of our native languages to enjoy literary works, to enrich our cultural taste, to develop our thinking and even to elevate human cultivation.

This four-credit course is set for the freshman students: with 2 credits in each of the two semesters of the school year. In the first semester, the course covers important articles in literature, in the hope for the student learners to cultivate better ability to taste literary works when they have more vivid sense on the language. With fuller knowledge on what literature is about, they are expected to try creative writings. For the second semester, the course is mainly focused on the writings on thoughts. It is our expectation that throughout the reading and analysis of various great schools of philosophy, the student learners are given the opportunity to explore the huge minds of philosophers, who will thus be imitated and followed. Through the internalization, the students might benefit themse

description.zh: 孫中山先生創立中華民國之立國精神在於三民主義之自由平等、民主、均富，此精神也就是依據的原則。本課程以中華民國憲法為經，　國父建國之理想步驟為緯，俾使學生充分瞭解我國之立國精神所在，並認識我國憲法的精神及內涵，培養學生維護憲法之尊嚴，以及愛國家愛民族之情操。
description.en: The Republic of China is established by Dr. Sun Yat-sen on the basis of Equality, Democracy, and Equated Distribution of Wealth, which are also the principles in San-Ming-Zhu-Yi (literally, Three Principles of the People). This course is made up of two focuses: the Constitution of the Republic of China and the ideal approaches which lead to the establishment of the very nation to the purpose that the students would realize the constitutional spirit and the underlying meaning, so as to cultivate a patriotic love for the country and its people.

description.zh: 本課程旨在培養學生熟悉日常生活英語會話及以正常速度聽講之能力。課程內容取材自學生周遭所熟悉事務, 藉由媒體傳播素材來訓練學生經常聽講之能力，並在課堂中研討其內容以達到運用之目的。
description.en: This course is designed to familiarize students with daily spoken English as well as listening and speaking skills. The content includes a wide variety of authentic multimedia materials-printed audio and video texts.  This gives students an opportunity for both recognition of different speaking styles and an in-depth, culture-rich understanding of the topics from multiple perspectives. Real-life situations are rehearsed in the classroom, with role-plays, situational activities, excerpts from newspapers and magazines and interviews with real people. Speaking practices based on day-to-day language are emphasized in class.

description.zh: 本課程藉由不同情境之英語錄影帶, 以及專題的語彙題目來提供一個英語談話的情境使學生能學習合宜的詞句。小組討論、角色演練、口頭報告皆為主要教學技巧，俾能增強學生之聽說能力。
description.en: This course aims at providing an English-speaking environment to allow students learn about the speaking strategies and common expressions used in different situations through viewing video films and oral practice. Small-group/pair discussion and role-playing are also parts of the methodologies.

description.zh: 本課程分為兩部分：（1）英文文法觀念的溫故知新，並引導學生將正確的文法觀念運用在閱讀與寫作上，學生可加強基本句型練習、句子改正及句型修正。相關討論包括直述句、引述句、句型變化與修飾;（2）英語修辭法：聽講溝通的有效原理原則。課堂討論主題包括：指稱、一致、倒裝等修辭觀念。修習本課後，學生對出現在相同邏輯意義語境中， 利用不同表達方式以凸顯各種語意的方式與內涵，當有更進一步的體認。
description.en: This course is divided into two parts: (a) The first part is designed for the students to  familiarize themselves with English grammatical framework in relation to reading and writing. A review of grammatical ideas at high level is reinforced by correcting sentence errors, and revising awkward usage of words or sentence structures. The main subjects include English sentence structures, verbal usages, conjunctions, and sequences. Related topics for class discussion cover direct and indirect speech, sentence transformation and modification of sentences; (b) The second half of the course focuses on English rhetoric--principles of effective written and spoken communication. Topics for class discussion include reference, coherence, reverse structures and some related rhetorical concepts. It is hoped that the students will know better the significance brought about by the variations of different expressions that occur in the similar linguistic contexts.

description.zh: 本課程透過希臘英雄的偉大冒險故事以及希伯來聖經傳統中的聖哲事蹟來探索早期西方文明的兩大源頭（希臘與希伯來文化）所呈現出的主要風貌。
description.en: The main features of two great sources of early western civilizations, that is (1) Greek mythology and tragedies, and (2) Hebrew Biblical tradition, will be introduced to the students in the most exciting stories about Greek heroes and heroines as well as Biblical figures and events.

description.zh: 本課程精選有關教育與文化之文章，引導學生從閱讀中印證，比較各種文化和教育現象，並鼓勵學生從各種不同角度蒐集資料，俾使課堂討論呈現時代性與多元化的觀點。
description.en: This course is intended to help students develop their English proficiency through readings and discussions on discourses of education and culture.  Students are encouraged to react to the experiences described, relate them to their own lives and express their feelings and thoughts through interactive speaking activities.

description.zh: 培養正確的英語發音與腔調，並訓練學生熟悉如何使用音標記錄發音以及辨認學習者在英語發音中經常發生的問題。  課程中也介紹英語語音系統的主要規則。
description.en: This course will be concerned with English speech sounds and stress patterns, the use of phonetic symbols for transcribing pronunciation and identifying pronunciation problems. The general principles of English phonology will be introduced.

description.zh: 本課程訓練進階的文書處理專業能力外，加強排版作業技術的精進。內容包括：專業領域論文撰寫，書籍，報章雜誌編排等，並加強培養個人在職場的技術能力延伸。
description.en: This course helps strengthen the ability of desk publishing as well as the professional skills in advanced word processing.  The topics cover: thesis writing in the individually professional fields, demonstration and practice of desk publishing in books, newspapers and magazines, with the aim to cultivate more powerful techniques and more extensive ability in the future occupations.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 提供本校四技學生在本行以外，對其他領域的認識，以彌補其只鑽研專業課程的偏頗，訓練學生整合知識，使不致在知識爆炸的時代中迷失，促進各種專材的溝通，培養共識；培育人文素養，啟發人文關懷，使具有完整的人生觀。
description.en: This course offers a good opportunity for four-year college students in this university to have an easier access to a completely different field of knowledge, in the hope that  students can add their individual professional knowledge and broaden their minds. The students will be furnished with integrated knowledge, discovering a better way towards professional communication, developing more common sense and never losing themselves in this information-explosive age. With a solid basis on humanity and liberal ideology, they are sure to find a more complete picture of human life.

description.zh: 以實務性專題提供學生獨立研究、設計、實驗之機會。
description.en: The course uses the practical project to help students to build independent research , design and experiment.

description.zh: 本課程在介紹如何運用企業內與員工之有關資源，包括其能力、知識、技術、態度和激勵、以配合企業整體競爭策略和形式。其內容計有：人力資源的分析、策略及目標、支援性作業之取得、發展及報酬，人力資源的維護。
description.en: This course is introduce that how to use resource about inside of Business and staff. It's including ability, knowledge, technology, attitude and encourage. To harmony with tactics and form of entirety business. The context of course have Human Resources Analysis, tactics and goal, support to operating about how to get, developing, rewards, and maintain of human resources.

description.zh: 經理需要以現代管理必要的 "資訊-基礎"來支持，俾使達到和滿足(相遇)他們的組織目標。管理資訊系統(MIS) 是整合使用者和機構系統，用以提供一個組織之操作支援，管理分析，和決策功能。我們以學習資訊工作者的角色，幫助經理滿足(相遇)組織目標， 以及檢查資訊系統的特徵，使經理工作更容易順暢。學習主題：透過資訊系統獲取策略優勢、透過資訊系統應用，支持經理和執行、管理固有的冒險，俾使發展和資訊系統應用、獲得和實踐技術性領導
description.en: 英文概述	The need for information-based support for managers is increasing as the modern management imperatives of reach and to meet their organization's goals. A management information system (MIS) is an integrated user + Machine system that provides information to support operations, management analysis, and decision- making functions in an organization. We will also look at the role in formation play in helping managers meet goals by examining the characteristics of information systems that make managers' job easier. Topic of learning:‧Acquiring strategic advantage through information systems.‧Supporting managers and executives through IS applications.‧Managing the risk inherent in developing and using IS applications.‧Attaining and practicing technological leadership.

description.zh: 本課程主要了解行銷研究的本質與特性，掌握行銷研究要領，進而具備規劃與執行行銷研究的能力，包含下列：行銷研究的環境與基本觀念，網路資料庫介紹，資料蒐集模式與方法，問卷設計與抽樣，量表製作，資料分析，研究成果呈現與溝通。
description.en: This course aims to help participants understand the nature and features of marketing research, realize how to conduct marketing research, and develop a toolset for the planning and implementation of marketing research. It has the followings: Background of Marketing Research, Introduction to Marketing Research, Database and Data Collection: Types and Methods, Measurement Instruments and Sampling, Data Analysis, Communicating with Research Users

description.zh: 物流管理： 本課程在使學生瞭解生產的物品或提供的服務能適時適地，並以最少的成本送到顧客手中。 本課程之內容如下： 1.物流管理和策略 2.運輸和配送 3.保管與包裝 4.定單處理 5.採購 6.物料搬運 7.物流成本 8.物流服務 9.資訊系統 10.物流生產力衡量 11.個案實務研討。
description.en: Logistics Management: The aim of the course is to help the students understand how to perform logistics activities so as to make products and services available to customers at the time place, and in the condition and from desired in the most profitable or cost-effective way. The content of the course description: 1. Logistics management & Strategy 2.Transpor totion 3.Inventory maintenance 4.Order processing 5.Purchasing 6.Warehousing & packaging 7.Materials handling 8.Logistics costs 9.Logistics customer service 10.Productivity measurement .11.Case study.

description.zh: 幫助同學了解投資的理論與實務發展,訓練分析能力與培養正確投資觀念：投資學基礎、固定收益證券、權益證券、投資組合分析與管理、衍生性金融商品與風險管理
description.en: To introduce the developments of investment theories and practice to the students and try to enhance their analysis ability. ＊concepts of investment＊fixed-income securities＊equity securities＊portfolio theory and analysis＊financial derivatives and risk management

description.zh: 課程主要介紹企業資訊網路與管理相關議題，讓同學瞭解日趨複雜的網路系統，及如何管理並達到資訊安全的功能與機制。內容主要包含(1)企業網路概論、(2)企業資訊系統、(3)資訊安全、(4)網路管理、(5)網路應用等。
description.en: This course introduces the related topics of enterprise information network and management. The participants learn about what is the enterprise network system and how to manage the network under security considerations. Several topics to be discussed are: (1) Introduction to enterprise network, (2) Enterprise information system, (3) Information security, (4) Network management, (5)Network application etc.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 本課程以與學生日常生活相關的情境為主題，協助學生建立自然、流利的英語溝通技巧。語程側重訓練學生下列語言能力；(1)重音、縮音、連音、及語調等發音基礎訓練；(2)聆聽大意及特定資訊之能力；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式。本課程使用語言教室視聽器材實施教學。除聆聽錄音教材、配對練習、角色扮演、演說、表演短劇、及小組討論外，並佐以錄影教材，以加強實際演練與師生互動。
description.en:
This training is designated to help students establish
communicative skills through natural and authentic English,
contextualized in lively, interesting situations related to
students' immediate needs. Special focuses will be on
(1) listening for main ideas and for specific information;
(2) pronunciation exercises targeted at important features
of English, such as stress, rhythm, intonation, reduction,
and linking sounds; (3) conversational fluency providing
students with a wide range of useful conversational
expressions.  Classes will be conducted in the language labs,and students will be expected to participate in class
discussions, oral drills after listening to tapes and watching videos.  Lots of interaction with other students either in pairs or in small or large group activities will be emphasized.

description.zh: 本課程承續學生一年級的英文基礎，提供學生更多閱讀機會，並加強閱讀策略指導，以培養學生獨立閱讀、及使用適當英文表達之能力。教材以介紹英語地區文化、思想、及價值觀為主，以協助學生建立世界觀，並培養其批判思考能力。教學活動以團體討論、小組討論、段落與短文習作實施。
description.en: The objective of this course are: (1)to provide the students with abundant reading opportunities based on the students' levels;(2)to introduce various reading strategies to the students so that they may find the optimal strategies to help themselves read independently; and (3)to furnish students with competence in writing. Reading selections will be mainly focused on discussion of the cultures, thoughts and values of the English-speaking world. Students will be able to join activities which encompasses group discussion, small group discussion, paragraph writing and essay writing.

description.zh:
經典是珍貴的世界遺產，是人類文化不朽的標記。無論東方或西方，舉凡任何領域的活動，皆有經典。經典之所以為經典，在於其揭示出永恆的理念，讓人不斷傳承，成為我們思慮云為的起跑點。經典的理念，超越時空限制，具有不可磨滅的參考價值。
本課程旨在教導學生閱讀重要經典，學習如何研讀該經典的方法，以期有系統地瞭解該經典的內涵。因為經典的普世通達，讓我們得以運用共同認知的思想，建立與人溝通的基礎路徑；因為經典的先見之明，讓我們得以運用崇高的智慧，檢視自己，照見生命旅程之中的每一個腳步。
description.en:
Ancient classics-a culturally significant mark for people in every part of the world--are an important heritage for all human civilization as well as for each of the individual ethnic groups that owns them. In Eastern and Western world, there exist a diversity of classics in all fields of activities. Classics are highly recommended just because they point out eternal ideas to follow and they are considered the starting point to think about. The value of Classics increases as they break through the limit of space and time. 
This course teaches the students how to read important Classics so that the learners--as they know better ways to study and do research on Classics-will go into the deeper parts of the Classics more systematically. By studying classics where universal implications are available, we are able to take advantage of the commonly acknowledged principles to build up the fundamentally communicative paths with other people. Besides, since the prophetic visions are omnipresen

description.zh: 本課程的設計以歷史趨勢的闡述及專題研究分析二方面同時進行。課程方面包括中、西歷史觀念的比較與中國歷代政治、經濟、社會、文化的歷史演進，藉以幫助學生認識時代之趨勢與意義。授課方式以口頭講述為主，討論及書面報告為輔，期使學生在短時間內，能對中國歷史有一簡要而清晰的了解，深化學生的歷史感。
description.en: Methodologically, the course is performed in two ways at the same time: interpretation of historical trends as well as the study and analysis of specific topics. The course will cover: comparison of historical concepts and the historical development of a long term of Chinese history in the fields of politics, economics, society and culture so that the students who take this course will sure understand better the trends and significance as the historical time spans go by. Class activities are made up of: lectures, student discussion and paper presentation. The students who take this course will have a brief but clear understanding of the Chinese history in a short time-thus embedding themselves with a deeper sense of history.

description.zh: 提供本校四技學生在本行以外，對其他領域的認識，以彌補其只鑽研專業課程的偏頗，訓練學生整合知識，使不致在知識爆炸的時代中迷失，促進各種專材的溝通，培養共識；培育人文素養，啟發人文關懷，使具有完整的人生觀。
description.en: This course offers a good opportunity for four-year college students in this university to have an easier access to a completely different field of knowledge, in the hope that  students can add their individual professional knowledge and broaden their minds. The students will be furnished with integrated knowledge, discovering a better way towards professional communication, developing more common sense and never losing themselves in this information-explosive age. With a solid basis on humanity and liberal ideology, they are sure to find a more complete picture of human life.

description.zh:
大二上學期為軍訓（三）兩學分選修，在下列三單元中選擇兩者，概述如下：孫子兵法－－使學生了解我國固有兵學思想、戰爭原理、原則及戰爭指導藝術，啟發學生對兵學研究之興趣，增進軍事修養，建立全民國防共識，以維護國家安全。國防科技－－使學生對武器及武器系統與目前世界各國所發展使用的新式武器能作有系統的認識，並對我國獨立自主的國防科技發展成就有所了解，以啟發青年學生參與國防科技研究的興趣。護理與健康－－概述同大一女生部份。
國防科技－－使學生對武器及武器系統與目前世界各國所發展使用的新式武器能作有系統的認識，並對我國獨立自主的國防科技發展成就有所了解，以啟發青年學生參與國防科技研究的興趣。
護理與健康－－概述同大一女生部份。
description.en: Military Training includes three Courses at the first semester of second year. They are Sun Tzu's Art of War, National Defense Technology, Nursing and Health. Sophomores can choice any two of tem. Sun Tzu's Art of War introduces you into new area of thought of war. National Defense Technology affords you a thorough and systematic knowledge of world's high technology weapons. Nursing and Health is a course of teaching you how to take cares your own body and mind.

name.en: Database System and Database System and Applications

description.zh: 資料庫系統與應用課程的目的在研習資料庫設計與管理技術及其在企業的應用。本課程方向包括：資料庫管理系統架構、關聯式資料模式、關聯式資料庫設計理論、關聯查詢最佳化、關聯式資料庫管理系統：以MS SQL Server為例，以實務性方式，培養學生對資料庫系統設計開發之能力。
description.en: The objective of this course is to study the techniques of how to design and manage a database system. The topics contained in this course are: database system structure, relational database, E-R model, relational database design, query optimization, relational database management system-MS SQL Server etc. After studying this course, students should be able to design databases and manage database systems.

description.zh: 本課程的重點在於闡述統計學之基本概念，主要的內容涵蓋三個領域：敘述統計、機率理論與推論統計，其中包含概念介紹、敘述統計、機率理論、推論統計。另有統計學的應用領域於推論未知的情況以作為相關決策之依據，並包含統計軟體使用介紹。
description.en: The purpose of Statistics is to give students an introductory of statistical thinking, methods development and the assessment of credibility and value of inferences made from data.  A conceptual introduction to the field of statistics and its many applications with extensive coverage of data collection and analysis as needed to evaluate the reported results of statistical students and make a good decision will be included as well. The statistical software introduction will also be introduced in the class.

description.zh: 本課程適合一般大專行銷管理之授課。其目的在尋求優良的產品行銷管理方法，以求企業之良好利潤。本課程授課內容在使學生瞭解行銷管理之觀念，產品設計、產品運銷、促銷及訂價。相關之授課內容包括：市場區隔、市場組織、購買行為、產品開發、零售、批發、促銷、廣告及訂價程序等。
description.en: The marketing course is suitable to college student. The purpose is to find good method of product marketing, in order to pursuit good profit of enterprise. The course contents' goal makes student understand the idea of marketing, product design, product transportation, promotion and price setting. The related course includes: market segmentation, market organization, the behavior of buying, product development, retailing, whole-saling promotion, advertising and price setting process.

description.zh: 本課程藉由探討組織理論之內容，分析組織設計之相關因素，並討論當代組織最新的設計與發展趨勢，俾使同學結合組織設計之傳統及現代理論，利用個案討論增強理論之理解與活用，進而培養學生管理組織之能力。本課程包含下列四大要綱：第一部份：組織與組織理論基礎 ；第二部分：組織結構與設計；第三部分：網際網路環境下，當代與未來的組織設計趨勢；第四部份：組織理論個案探討。本課程藉由探討組織理論之內容，分析組織設計之相關因素，並討論當代組織最新的設計與發展趨勢，俾使同學結合組織設計之傳統及現代理論，利用個案討論增強理論之理解與活用，進而培養學生管理組織之能力。本課程包含下列四大要綱：第一部份：組織與組織理論基礎 ；第二部分：組織結構與設計；第三部分：網際網路環境下，當代與未來的組織設計趨勢；第四部份：組織理論個案探討。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to integrate the most resent thinking about organization design with classic and traditional ideas and theories. This course covers the following three major parts: Part 1: organization and organization theories Part 2: organization structure and design Part 3: new thinking of organization design in the Internet era, Part IV case study.

description.zh: 本課程目的在培養學生有關產經的理論基礎，一開始將對產經學門的分析架構與演變做一介紹，之後則對各項分析理論進行解說。理論方面將包括廠商理論、獨占廠商理論、寡占廠商理論等。對於理論的應用上則使用個案研討的方式。
description.en: The industrial economics is concerned with how productive activities are brought into harmony with the demand for goods and services through some organizing mechanism. In additions, this course will also teach the students how variations and imperfections in the organizing mechanism affect the success achieved in satisfying an economy's wants.

description.zh: 在接洽商務時能以最基本的日文能力應用在名片交換、自我介紹或洽商時基本會話、禮儀及習俗等之應對。第一篇：商務必備 第一章：交換名片與自我介紹 第二章：電話應對實務 第三章：商務會話實務第二篇：模擬洽商 第一章：到日本訪問時的商務會話實務 第二章：在台與日商買主交涉商業實務第三篇：日本文化有趣篇
description.en: This course introduces the fundamental conversation, courtesies and customs by using the Japanese. In addition to understand the origins and significance of these business behaviors, the students will be requested to conduct a simulated practice, such as changing the business card and self-introduction, in the class to have a better realization.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 本軍訓課程分四學期，大一上學期為軍訓（一）零學分，概述如下：戰爭概論－－使學生了解戰爭的涵義與指導要領，藉以體認「好戰必亡，忘戰必危」的真義，以樹立國防共識，維護國家安全，並增進對國家生存、民族發展的必勝信念。陸軍概要－－使學生了解我國陸軍之沿革、使命、特性、組織體系、教育訓練、情報、作戰、後勤及未來發展，增進對陸軍之認識。
description.en: The military training courses comprise four semesters. During the first semester, there are two subjects which are the War Conception and the Introduction of Army. The War Conception is designed to make student understand the definition of War and the guidelines of the War. By knowing the War, we can realize that the bellicose must lead to destruction, while the ignorant lead to risk, and build the consensus that the National Defense and security is crucial to National survival and development. The introduction of Army is designed to make student understand the army's history, task, character, origination, intelligence, operation, logistics and the future development.

description.zh: 本課程設計重點有三：(1)藉由精選的中級程度教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
description.en: This course is designed (1) to strengthen students' previously required knowledge in English with basic grammatical ideas and sentence patterns reviewed through selected materials at intermediate level; (2) to get the most (gist) out of the reading and appreciate the writing strategy of diverse interests. Focuses will be on explanation of difficult words, phrases, and syntax, as well as on analysis of fostering a basic writing skill; (3) to reinforce the competence and performance of listening, speaking, reading and writing by practice.

description.zh: 本課程以與學生日常生活相關的情境為主題，協助學生建立自然、流利的英語溝通技巧。語程側重訓練學生下列語言能力；(1)重音、縮音、連音、及語調等發音基礎訓練；(2)聆聽大意及特定資訊之能力；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式。本課程使用語言教室視聽器材實施教學。除聆聽錄音教材、配對練習、角色扮演、演說、表演短劇、及小組討論外，並佐以錄影教材，以加強實際演練與師生互動。
description.en:
This training is designated to help students establish
communicative skills through natural and authentic English,
contextualized in lively, interesting situations related to
students' immediate needs. Special focuses will be on
(1) listening for main ideas and for specific information;
(2) pronunciation exercises targeted at important features
of English, such as stress, rhythm, intonation, reduction,
and linking sounds; (3) conversational fluency providing
students with a wide range of useful conversational
expressions.  Classes will be conducted in the language labs,and students will be expected to participate in class
discussions, oral drills after listening to tapes and watching videos.  Lots of interaction with other students either in pairs or in small or large group activities will be emphasized.

description.zh: 廣義的法律包括憲法、法律、命令等。作為國家最高規範的憲法，其核心價值在於維護人性尊嚴；其所要保障的基本權（自由權、平等權、生存權、財產權、工作權……）、受益權、參政權、人格權等，均有賴相關法律的實踐方能落實。本課程主要在探討憲政體制的運作、人民權利義務的規範及相關法律的適用等問題。期能認知國家民主法治的實施狀況，維護社會秩序與個人基本權利，進而體現人性尊嚴的價值。
description.en: Laws, if broadly defined, include constitutions, legal rules and orders. The Constitution--as the supreme norm of a country-have as its essence the preservation of human dignities. All the basic rights protected by the Constitution (such as the rights to freedom, equality, survival, properties and the possession of a job), the right to be benefited, the right to participate in politics and the right of humanity cannot be fully realized without the help of laws. This course focuses the discussions on constitutional mechanism, the rights and obligations for the people and legitimate operations of the society. It is our hope that the students may have a better understanding on how the democracy is performed in our country as well as on how to preserve social security and basic human rights of the individuals-with the realization of human dignity as our extreme goal.

description.zh:
國文，是運用本國語言文字，蘊釀於欣賞文藝作品，充實文化內涵，增進思維能力與人文素養的一門課程。
本課程分為大一上學期2學分，大一下學期2學分。大一上學期的授課內容，以文學名篇為範圍；希望藉此擴建學生深入品味文學趣味的能力，鍛鍊靈活的語文敏感度，默契文學創意，甚而嘗試創作。大一下學期的授課內容，以思想名篇為範圍；希望藉此啟發學生透轍分析各家學說思想，漫步哲人的宇宙天地，跟隨哲人的心路歷程，進而念茲在茲，從容內化，共饗取之不盡用之不竭的先驗與風範。
description.en:
"Chinese" is the course where we make full use of our native languages to enjoy literary works, to enrich our cultural taste, to develop our thinking and even to elevate human cultivation.

This four-credit course is set for the freshman students: with 2 credits in each of the two semesters of the school year. In the first semester, the course covers important articles in literature, in the hope for the student learners to cultivate better ability to taste literary works when they have more vivid sense on the language. With fuller knowledge on what literature is about, they are expected to try creative writings. For the second semester, the course is mainly focused on the writings on thoughts. It is our expectation that throughout the reading and analysis of various great schools of philosophy, the student learners are given the opportunity to explore the huge minds of philosophers, who will thus be imitated and followed. Through the internalization, the students might benefit themse

description.zh: 介紹會計學之基本觀念， 會計循環 - 包括分錄、過帳、試算、結算及財務報表之編製。逐一說明財務報表各個項目，最後並介紹財務報表之分析。修畢本課程之後能瞭解會計學之基本原理，會計資料處理及財務報表產生之整個過程，以及簡單之財務報表分析技術，並為未來之企業及財務相關課程打下良好基礎。
description.en: This course introduces the basic concepts of accounting. All the necessary processes are included as well the financial report analysis. After being taking this course, the student can understand the accounting concepts, accounting data process, generation of accounting report and techniques for analyzing the financial report.

description.zh: 本課程的重點在於闡述管理學之基本概念，主要的內容涵蓋四個領域：(1)瞭解管理學之理論與相關學者之研究報告；(2) 討論企業界管理應用實務案例；(3) 探討多國化管理之趨勢與差異及(4) 如何落實管理理論研討與趨勢。另外一有管理相關功能實務應用之討論與介紹。
description.en: The purpose of Management has four distinct objectives:(1) to introduce a new management paradigm；(2) to effectively combine the basic concepts of management and organizational behavior into a single volume, including the management functional and departmental descriptions；(3) to discuss business management applications in practice and (4) to effectively implement the management basic ideas. The planning, organization, decision, leadership and monitoring among variety culture will be covered and discussed in the class as well.

description.zh: 學習基本觀念及經濟理論及應用經濟學解決新問題及分析新議題，以新方法解答新議題及新方式表達新想法及舊議題。1.供給、需求及市場均衡。2.消費者及生產者的行為。3.市場結構。4.總體經濟議題。5.國內生產毛額及經濟成長。6.銀行體系。7.總體經濟政策。8.國際貿易及國際金融。
description.en: To learn basic concepts and theories of Economics. To apply economics to solve new problems and analyze new issues, ask new issues, formulate new ideas, and view old issues, in new ways.1.Supply, demand, and market equilibrium.2.Consumer's behaviors and producer's behaviors.3.Market structures.4.Macroeconomic issues.5.GDP and economic growth.6.Banking system.7.Macroeconomic policies.8.International trade and international finance.

description.zh: 本課程包含：計算機硬體結構、計算機作業系統、計算機軟體系統、程式語言、基本程式設計與應用、資料處理、檔案管理、資料庫管理系統、應用套裝軟體、資料通訊與網路等。
description.en: This course consists of: computer hardware structure, computer operation systems, computer software systems, programming languages, basic programming language and applications, data process, file management, database management systems, application package, and data communication and network etc.

description.zh: 本課程希望在一學年中，能使學生對微分及積分有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習工程數學及相關專業課程之數學基礎，充分達到學以致用的目的。課程內容包括：1.極限與連續，2.導數及其應用，3.不定積分與定積分，4.超越函數及其反函數，5.積分法則，6.不定型與瑕積分，7.定積分的應用，8.空間幾何與向量微積分，9.偏導數，10.重積分。
description.en: This course aims at developing comprehension of Derivation and Integral、activating capabilities of Logic Inference and Induction、enlightening confidence and independence、strengthening calculating abilities with an emphasis on its application and diagram、furnishing a sound basis for future specialty. The content includes: 1.Limits and Continuity, 2.Derivative and Application, 3.Indefinite and Definite Integral, 4.Transcendental Functions and their Inverses, 5.Techniques of Integration, 6.Indeterminate Forms and Improper Integral, 7.Application of Integration, 8.Basic Vector Analysis, 9.Partial Derivative, 10.Multiple Integration.

description.zh: 主要介紹WORD及EXCEL商業應用軟體的面貌。因為WORD及EXCEL皆是集實用性及教育性於一身的整合性軟體，包括文書處理、資料庫、試算表、圖表等功能。同學專精這兩個軟體後，可嘗試完成各種商業實務的應用，而且也可以為學習更精深的專業軟體建立基礎。
description.en: This course mainly talks about the business application software-WORD and EXCEL. Since WORD and EXCEL are practical and educational software, the course would be very useful and helpful for the participants' future careers. After learning the software, the students can try to carry out business applications and do further study of advanced software.

description.zh: 本課程教導學生作為一位諮詢顧問師所需具備的技巧及在今日工商社會中有效溝通的要件。本課程所涵蓋的主題為：1.管理諮詢的目的和範圍，2. 顧問師的職責和角色，3. 諮詢的過程，4. 計劃書的擬定與合約的草擬，5. 訪談與展示的技巧，及6. 手冊與研究報告的撰寫。學生必須完成一項分組個案來應証對本課程所教授的管理諮詢與溝通技巧。
description.en: This course teaches the students basic skills possessed by a management consultant and the criteria for effective communication in today's business community. Topics covered by this course are: (1) Scope and Purpose of Management Consulting, (2) Duties and Roles of A Consultant, (3) Consulting Process (4) Writing a Proposal and Drafting A Contract, (5) Interview and Presentation Skills, and (6) Development of a Manual and Report Writing. A group project is required to demonstrate student's understanding of the consulting and communication skills learned in this course.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 提供本校四技學生在本行以外，對其他領域的認識，以彌補其只鑽研專業課程的偏頗，訓練學生整合知識，使不致在知識爆炸的時代中迷失，促進各種專材的溝通，培養共識；培育人文素養，啟發人文關懷，使具有完整的人生觀。
description.en: This course offers a good opportunity for four-year college students in this university to have an easier access to a completely different field of knowledge, in the hope that  students can add their individual professional knowledge and broaden their minds. The students will be furnished with integrated knowledge, discovering a better way towards professional communication, developing more common sense and never losing themselves in this information-explosive age. With a solid basis on humanity and liberal ideology, they are sure to find a more complete picture of human life.

description.zh: 1.組合分析2.機率公設3.條件機率與獨立4.離散隨機變數5.連續隨機變數6.結合分佈隨機變數7.期望值性質8.極限定理9.模擬
description.en: 1.Combinatorial Analysis 2.Axioms of Probability3.	Conditional Probability and Independence4.Discrete Random Variables5.Continuous Random Variables6.Jointly Distributed Random Variables7.Properties of Expectation 8.Limit Theorems 9.Simulation

description.zh: 本科目介紹各種系統軟體之基本觀念、設計、實作方法以及其與硬體架構之關連性。主要內容包括： 1.系統軟體概念與電腦結構 2.組譯器基本概念 3.組譯器之設計與實作 4.載入器與連結器之基本概念 5.載入器與連結器之設計與實作 6.巨集處理器之基本概念 7.巨集處理器之設計與實作 8.編譯器之基本功能 9.編譯器之設計與實作 10.其他系統軟體之介紹。
description.en: This course is an introduction to the concepts, design, and implementation of various types of system software, as well as the relationship between system software and hardware architecture. The major topics covered in this course are : 1.System software and machine structures 2.The concept of assemblers 3.The design and implementation of assembler 4.The concept of loader and linker 5.The design and implementation of loader and linker 6.The concept of macro processor 7.The design and implementation of macro processor 8.The concept of compiler 9. The design and implementation of compiler 10.Other System Software

description.zh: １.電腦網路概述與網路階層結構２.路由與交換技術與協定 ３.錯誤、流量與擁塞控制 ４.媒體存取控制 ５.區域網路技術與應用６.網際網路協定與標準７.網路互連技術８.網路機制效能評估
description.en: １.Computer network overview and layered communications２.	Routing and switching protocol３.Error, flow and congestion control ４.Medium access control ５.Local area networks６.	Network protocols and standards ７.Network interconnection８.Performance analysis

description.zh: 本課程由老師指導學生選定題目，進行該題目之問題定義、分析、設計與製作。專題完成後需撰寫書面報告並公開展示成品。專題範圍包含：1.多媒體系統 2.電腦網路 3.軟體分析與設計4.影像與音訊處理 5.微算機應用
description.en: In this course, the instructor will guide the students to fulfill a special project through the phases of problem formulation, analysis, design and implementation. The final work should be demonstrated in the public along with a written report. The topics include 1.Multimedia systems 2.Computer networks 3.Software analysis and design 4.Audio and video signal processing 5.Microprocessor-based applications

description.zh: 透過原理解說與系統實作，使學生熟悉J2EE (Java 2 Enterprise Edition)架構下，開發企業級網際網路應用系統所需之各項整合技術，包括：1. J2EE平台架構 2. J2EE系統開發環境 3. Java物件技術 4. JavaBeans元件設計 5. JDBC資料庫應用 6. JSP網頁技術 7. Servlet元件技術 8. MVC架構設計 9. JMS訊息服務 10. EJB元件設計 11. Web Services整合技術 12. JAAS安全技術 13. J2ME行動通信技術
description.en: To familiarize the student with the J2EE, Java 2 Enterprise Edition, technologies on enterprise systems integration design. Topics include: 1. J2EE architecture. 2. J2EEdevelopment environments 3. Java OO technologies 4. JavaBeans 5. JDBC 6. Java Server Page 7. Servlet 8. MVC design pattern 9. Java Messaging System 10. Enterprise Java Beans 11. Web Services 12. Java Authentication and Authorization Service 13. Java 2 Micro Edition

description.zh: 1.輸入輸出工作：非同步匯流排(asynchronous Bus)，仲裁設計(arbitration)，同步匯流排(synchronous Bus)，程式化I/O與直接記憶進出(programmed I/O and DMA)，I/O通道與I/O處理器(I/O channels and I/O processors)， 2.平行處理(parallel processing)：管線系統(pipelined processor)，運算管線(arithmetic pipeline)，指令管線(instruction pipeline)，矩陣處理器(array processor)，多處理器系統(MIMD)。
description.en: 1. I/O operations: asynchronous bus, arbitration, synchronous bus, programmed I/O and DMA, I/O channel and I/O processors 2. parallel processing: pipelined processor, arithmetic pipeline, instruction pipeline, array processor, and MIMD.

description.zh: 本課程內容包含：電晶體及金氧半電晶體之高頻特性，電路之頻率響應，回授之介紹及影響，穩定度之探討，切換式電容電路介紹，類比積體電路之介紹，及數位積體電路之介紹。
description.en: This course covers the following topics: behaviors of BJT's and MOSFET's at high frequencies, frequency response of an electronic circuit, introduction to feedback, stability issues, switched-capacitor circuits, introduction to analog integrated circuits, introduction to digital integrated circuits.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 本課程以與學生日常生活相關的情境為主題，協助學生建立自然、流利的英語溝通技巧。語程側重訓練學生下列語言能力；(1)重音、縮音、連音、及語調等發音基礎訓練；(2)聆聽大意及特定資訊之能力；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式。本課程使用語言教室視聽器材實施教學。除聆聽錄音教材、配對練習、角色扮演、演說、表演短劇、及小組討論外，並佐以錄影教材，以加強實際演練與師生互動。
description.en:
This training is designated to help students establish
communicative skills through natural and authentic English,
contextualized in lively, interesting situations related to
students' immediate needs. Special focuses will be on
(1) listening for main ideas and for specific information;
(2) pronunciation exercises targeted at important features
of English, such as stress, rhythm, intonation, reduction,
and linking sounds; (3) conversational fluency providing
students with a wide range of useful conversational
expressions.  Classes will be conducted in the language labs,and students will be expected to participate in class
discussions, oral drills after listening to tapes and watching videos.  Lots of interaction with other students either in pairs or in small or large group activities will be emphasized.

description.zh: 本課程承續學生一年級的英文基礎，提供學生更多閱讀機會，並加強閱讀策略指導，以培養學生獨立閱讀、及使用適當英文表達之能力。教材以介紹英語地區文化、思想、及價值觀為主，以協助學生建立世界觀，並培養其批判思考能力。教學活動以團體討論、小組討論、段落與短文習作實施。
description.en: The objective of this course are: (1)to provide the students with abundant reading opportunities based on the students' levels;(2)to introduce various reading strategies to the students so that they may find the optimal strategies to help themselves read independently; and (3)to furnish students with competence in writing. Reading selections will be mainly focused on discussion of the cultures, thoughts and values of the English-speaking world. Students will be able to join activities which encompasses group discussion, small group discussion, paragraph writing and essay writing.

description.zh: 本課程的設計以歷史趨勢的闡述及專題研究分析二方面同時進行。課程方面包括中、西歷史觀念的比較與中國歷代政治、經濟、社會、文化的歷史演進，藉以幫助學生認識時代之趨勢與意義。授課方式以口頭講述為主，討論及書面報告為輔，期使學生在短時間內，能對中國歷史有一簡要而清晰的了解，深化學生的歷史感。
description.en: Methodologically, the course is performed in two ways at the same time: interpretation of historical trends as well as the study and analysis of specific topics. The course will cover: comparison of historical concepts and the historical development of a long term of Chinese history in the fields of politics, economics, society and culture so that the students who take this course will sure understand better the trends and significance as the historical time spans go by. Class activities are made up of: lectures, student discussion and paper presentation. The students who take this course will have a brief but clear understanding of the Chinese history in a short time-thus embedding themselves with a deeper sense of history.

description.zh: 提供本校四技學生在本行以外，對其他領域的認識，以彌補其只鑽研專業課程的偏頗，訓練學生整合知識，使不致在知識爆炸的時代中迷失，促進各種專材的溝通，培養共識；培育人文素養，啟發人文關懷，使具有完整的人生觀。
description.en: This course offers a good opportunity for four-year college students in this university to have an easier access to a completely different field of knowledge, in the hope that  students can add their individual professional knowledge and broaden their minds. The students will be furnished with integrated knowledge, discovering a better way towards professional communication, developing more common sense and never losing themselves in this information-explosive age. With a solid basis on humanity and liberal ideology, they are sure to find a more complete picture of human life.

description.zh: 本課程是針對近代生物學感興趣的學生所設計，內容涵蓋生命與能量、細胞與分子生物學、生物多樣性、動植物的結構與功能、遺傳訊息的傳遞、生命的演化與生態。讓學生瞭解生命體系的輪廓，為生物科技的基礎課程。
description.en: A one-term introductory course intended for students interesting in modern life science. This course will cover topics in energy and life, cellular and molecular biology, biological diversity, structure and function of plant and animal, and transmission genetics. Principles of evolution and ecology will also be covered.

description.zh:
大二上學期為軍訓（三）兩學分選修，在下列三單元中選擇兩者，概述如下：孫子兵法－－使學生了解我國固有兵學思想、戰爭原理、原則及戰爭指導藝術，啟發學生對兵學研究之興趣，增進軍事修養，建立全民國防共識，以維護國家安全。國防科技－－使學生對武器及武器系統與目前世界各國所發展使用的新式武器能作有系統的認識，並對我國獨立自主的國防科技發展成就有所了解，以啟發青年學生參與國防科技研究的興趣。護理與健康－－概述同大一女生部份。
國防科技－－使學生對武器及武器系統與目前世界各國所發展使用的新式武器能作有系統的認識，並對我國獨立自主的國防科技發展成就有所了解，以啟發青年學生參與國防科技研究的興趣。
護理與健康－－概述同大一女生部份。
description.en: Military Training includes three Courses at the first semester of second year. They are Sun Tzu's Art of War, National Defense Technology, Nursing and Health. Sophomores can choice any two of tem. Sun Tzu's Art of War introduces you into new area of thought of war. National Defense Technology affords you a thorough and systematic knowledge of world's high technology weapons. Nursing and Health is a course of teaching you how to take cares your own body and mind.

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹在計算機科學中常見或基本的資料結構,探討的主題包括: ADT(抽像資料型態)及複雜度, 靜態結構與儲存表示, 陣列，堆疊，佇列，串列，樹狀結構，遞迴，排序, 搜尋。
description.en: This course is mainly aimed at introducing the data structures commonly used in programming languages which include ADT (abstract data type) and complexity, static structures and their storage representations, arrays, stacks, queues, linked lists, trees, recursion, sorting, and searching.

name.zh: 物件導向程式設計實習

description.zh: 使學生熟悉，物件導向程式設計之環境、方法、及原則，內容含：1. C++ 設計環境 2. 類別與物件實習 3. 建構者與解構者實習 4. 繼承實習 5. 虛擬函式與多型實習 6. 運算子溢載實習 7. 例外處理實習 8. 泛型程式設計實習 9. 標準模板程式庫實習 10. 期末專題設計
description.en: To familiarize the student with object-oriented programming tools and resources. Labs include object, method, inheritance, and exception topics. The software design life cycle. Program specification, design, implementation, testing, measuring, verification, and documentation. Readings/discussions on object-oriented languages and software development.  Introductory examples of object-oriented programming. Group projects. Individual project.

description.zh: 本課程在於介紹科學及工程系統中數項常用數學之原理及應用，內容涵蓋微分方程、差分方程及複變分析。授課內容大綱如下：1.一階微分方程式2.線性二階及高階微分方程式3.微分方程式之級數解4.差分方程5.複數及複變函數6.複數積分7.複冪級數8.餘數定理
description.en: This course aims to introduce students of science and engineering to some mathematics employed in their disciplines. Topics include differential equations, difference equations and complex analysis. The outline of this course is listed as follows.1.First Order Differential This course aims to introduce students of science and engineering to some mathematics employed in their disciplines. Topics include differential equations, difference equations and complex analysis. The outline of this course is listed as follows.1.First Order Differential Equations2.Second-Order and Higher Order Linear Differential Equations.3.Series Solutions of Differential Equations4.Difference Equations5.Complex Number and Complex Functions6.Complex Integration7.Complex Power Series8.	Residue Theorem

description.zh: 資料表示法：定點系統(fixed point system)，浮點系統(floating point system)，2.運算工作：定點之加減乘除，快速之運算，浮點運算，3.指令與控制：各種指令介紹，中斷，硬體控制單元設計(hardwired control)，微程式控制單元設計(microprogramming)，4.記憶系統：記憶體之層次 (memory hierarchy)，虛擬記憶系統 (virtual memory)，快速記憶 (cache memory)。
description.en: 1. data representation (fixed point and floating point systems) 2. arithmetic and logic operations 3. command and control (hardwired control and microprogramming) 4. memory organization (cache and virtual memory)

description.zh: １.數據通訊簡介：ISO 通訊協定的七個層面２.實體層面：各種通訊介質及其物理限制３.數據傳輸：同步問題、同步與非同步傳輸， ４.調變與編碼技術５.資料壓縮，錯誤偵測與更正６.數據鏈相關協定：錯誤控制，流程控制，數據鏈管理７.電腦網路概述：Local area networks，Wide area networks，TCP/IP及其他。
description.en: １.Data communication principles ２.Physical layers  ３.	Data encoding and information transfer４.Modulating techniques５.Data compression and error control６.Data link layer protocol and implememtation７.Introduction to computer networks

description.zh: 本課程在介紹資訊管理的基本概念. 課程內容包含: 1. 資訊與管理 2. 資訊科技 3. 資訊系統發展 4. 電子商務 5. 企業資源規劃 6. 供應鏈管理 7. 客戶關係管理 8. 資料探勘
description.en: The goal of this course is to introduce the basic concepts and techniques of information management. The outline of this course includes: 1. Information and Management 2. Information Technologies 3. Information System Development 4. Electronic Commerce 5. Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) 6. Supply Chain Management (SCM) 7. Customer Relationship Management (CRM) 8. Data Mining

description.zh: 本課程介紹電路基本元件與電路之分析方法，內容包含： 1.基本電路元件：電壓源、電流源、電阻器、電容器、電感器 2.柯希荷夫電壓與電流定律，簡單電阻電路，節點分析與網目分析 3.電路學定理：重疊定理、戴維寧與諾頓定理 4.一階電路 5.二階電路 6.弦波穩態分析 7.頻率響應 8.雙埠電路
description.en: The course introduces the basic circuit elements and the methods for analyzing circuits. The topics include: 1.Basic circuit elements: voltage sources, current sources, resistors, capacitors, inductors 2.Kirchhoff voltage and current laws, simple resistive circuits, node analysis and mesh analysis 3.Circuits theorems: superposition principle, Thevenin and Norton theorems 4.First-order circuits 5.Second-order circuits 6.Sinusoidal steady-state analysis 7.Frequency responses 8.Two-port networks

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 本軍訓課程分四學期，大一上學期為軍訓（一）零學分，概述如下：戰爭概論－－使學生了解戰爭的涵義與指導要領，藉以體認「好戰必亡，忘戰必危」的真義，以樹立國防共識，維護國家安全，並增進對國家生存、民族發展的必勝信念。陸軍概要－－使學生了解我國陸軍之沿革、使命、特性、組織體系、教育訓練、情報、作戰、後勤及未來發展，增進對陸軍之認識。
description.en: The military training courses comprise four semesters. During the first semester, there are two subjects which are the War Conception and the Introduction of Army. The War Conception is designed to make student understand the definition of War and the guidelines of the War. By knowing the War, we can realize that the bellicose must lead to destruction, while the ignorant lead to risk, and build the consensus that the National Defense and security is crucial to National survival and development. The introduction of Army is designed to make student understand the army's history, task, character, origination, intelligence, operation, logistics and the future development.

description.zh: 本課程設計重點有三：(1)藉由精選的中級程度教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
description.en: This course is designed (1) to strengthen students' previously required knowledge in English with basic grammatical ideas and sentence patterns reviewed through selected materials at intermediate level; (2) to get the most (gist) out of the reading and appreciate the writing strategy of diverse interests. Focuses will be on explanation of difficult words, phrases, and syntax, as well as on analysis of fostering a basic writing skill; (3) to reinforce the competence and performance of listening, speaking, reading and writing by practice.

description.zh: 本課程以與學生日常生活相關的情境為主題，協助學生建立自然、流利的英語溝通技巧。語程側重訓練學生下列語言能力；(1)重音、縮音、連音、及語調等發音基礎訓練；(2)聆聽大意及特定資訊之能力；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式。本課程使用語言教室視聽器材實施教學。除聆聽錄音教材、配對練習、角色扮演、演說、表演短劇、及小組討論外，並佐以錄影教材，以加強實際演練與師生互動。
description.en:
This training is designated to help students establish
communicative skills through natural and authentic English,
contextualized in lively, interesting situations related to
students' immediate needs. Special focuses will be on
(1) listening for main ideas and for specific information;
(2) pronunciation exercises targeted at important features
of English, such as stress, rhythm, intonation, reduction,
and linking sounds; (3) conversational fluency providing
students with a wide range of useful conversational
expressions.  Classes will be conducted in the language labs,and students will be expected to participate in class
discussions, oral drills after listening to tapes and watching videos.  Lots of interaction with other students either in pairs or in small or large group activities will be emphasized.

description.zh:
國文，是運用本國語言文字，蘊釀於欣賞文藝作品，充實文化內涵，增進思維能力與人文素養的一門課程。
本課程分為大一上學期2學分，大一下學期2學分。大一上學期的授課內容，以文學名篇為範圍；希望藉此擴建學生深入品味文學趣味的能力，鍛鍊靈活的語文敏感度，默契文學創意，甚而嘗試創作。大一下學期的授課內容，以思想名篇為範圍；希望藉此啟發學生透轍分析各家學說思想，漫步哲人的宇宙天地，跟隨哲人的心路歷程，進而念茲在茲，從容內化，共饗取之不盡用之不竭的先驗與風範。
description.en:
"Chinese" is the course where we make full use of our native languages to enjoy literary works, to enrich our cultural taste, to develop our thinking and even to elevate human cultivation.

This four-credit course is set for the freshman students: with 2 credits in each of the two semesters of the school year. In the first semester, the course covers important articles in literature, in the hope for the student learners to cultivate better ability to taste literary works when they have more vivid sense on the language. With fuller knowledge on what literature is about, they are expected to try creative writings. For the second semester, the course is mainly focused on the writings on thoughts. It is our expectation that throughout the reading and analysis of various great schools of philosophy, the student learners are given the opportunity to explore the huge minds of philosophers, who will thus be imitated and followed. Through the internalization, the students might benefit themse

description.zh: 本課程希望在一學年中，能使學生對微分及積分有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習工程數學及相關專業課程之數學基礎，充分達到學以致用的目的。課程內容包括：1.極限與連續，2.導數及其應用，3.不定積分與定積分，4.超越函數及其反函數，5.積分法則，6.不定型與瑕積分，7.定積分的應用，8.空間幾何與向量微積分，9.偏導數，10.重積分。
description.en: This course aims at developing comprehension of Derivation and Integral、activating capabilities of Logic Inference and Induction、enlightening confidence and independence、strengthening calculating abilities with an emphasis on its application and diagram、furnishing a sound basis for future specialty. The content includes: 1.Limits and Continuity, 2.Derivative and Application, 3.Indefinite and Definite Integral, 4.Transcendental Functions and their Inverses, 5.Techniques of Integration, 6.Indeterminate Forms and Improper Integral, 7.Application of Integration, 8.Basic Vector Analysis, 9.Partial Derivative, 10.Multiple Integration.

description.zh: 本校之普通物理課程專為工程科系背景之同學設計，主要的目的是鼓勵同學參與大自然運行奧秘、法則之探索，並供給爾後修習專業課程之堅實基礎。本課程之內容包含力學、熱力學、聲學、電磁學、光學及近代物理。教授者可按每週三小時、二個學期的時間設計、再參酌各系不同之需求、加強或節略某些章節。
description.en: The course is designed for the students with engineering background. The theme of this course is to encourage students to participate in the discovery of laws and wonder of nature, and to solidate the foundation for the particular courses of study for different departments. The contents of this course include mechanics, dynamics, thermodynamics, electromagnetics, optics, and foundation of modern physics, etc.. The lecturers will emphasize or abridge certain contents based on the individual needs of departments. For this course, there will be 3 credits for each of two semesters,  and 3 lecture hours per week.

description.zh: 本科目所探討的內容包括: 1. 集合與命題, 2. 計數、排列與組合, 3. 關聯與函式, 4. 基礎圖論,  5.樹狀結構, 6. 有限狀態機, 7. 演算法分析介紹, 8.生程函數, 9. 遞迴式10.群, 11. 布林幾何。
description.en: Covered topics include: (1) Sets and Propositions, (2) Counting, Permutations, and Combinations, (3) Relations and Functions, (4) Graphs, (5) Trees, (6) Finite State Machines, (7) Analysis of Algorithms, (8) Generating Functions, (9) Recurrence Relations, (10) Groups, and (11) Boolean Algebras.

description.zh: 本科目旨在介紹計算機系統之基礎觀念以及應用。主要內容包括：1.計算機系統簡介 2 .資料的表示法、數字系統、邏輯3.周邊裝置及儲存體 4. 程式語言與程式設計5. 軟體工程與系統開發工具6.資料結構與演算法 7.作業系統 8.檔案與資料庫 9.資料通訊與計算機網路10.人工智慧 11. 新興技術介紹
description.en: This introductory course covers the fundamentals and applications of computers. The major topics covered in this course are: 1.Introduction to computer systems 2.Data representation, number systems, and logic 3.Peripherals and storage 4. Programming languages and programming 5. Data structures and algorithms 6. Software engineering and system development tools 7. Operating systems 8.File and database systems 9. Data communication and computer networks 10. Artificial intelligence 11. Emerging techniques

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 提供本校四技學生在本行以外，對其他領域的認識，以彌補其只鑽研專業課程的偏頗，訓練學生整合知識，使不致在知識爆炸的時代中迷失，促進各種專材的溝通，培養共識；培育人文素養，啟發人文關懷，使具有完整的人生觀。
description.en: This course offers a good opportunity for four-year college students in this university to have an easier access to a completely different field of knowledge, in the hope that  students can add their individual professional knowledge and broaden their minds. The students will be furnished with integrated knowledge, discovering a better way towards professional communication, developing more common sense and never losing themselves in this information-explosive age. With a solid basis on humanity and liberal ideology, they are sure to find a more complete picture of human life.

description.zh:
瞭解複變函數及其在工程方面的應用，內容包含:
1.複數與複變函數
2.微分
3.積分
4.級數
5.留數定理
6.保角映射
description.en:
1.Complex numbers and Functions
2.Complex differential
3.Complex integration
4.Series
5.Residue theorem
6.Conformal mapping

description.zh: 先修課程：普通物理、工程數學。 從黑體輻射之頻譜分析開始，引入量子化的概念；進而推出物質與波動之二象性。經由波爾之半古典的氫原子模型，結合量子化的概念以解釋原子結構，並引入薛丁格方程式所求得之波函數與電子之空間機率的關係。再由原子進而推廣至分子及固態物理之能帶理論，應用能帶理論於解釋固態晶體之光、電及熱學等特性，並介紹半導體之應用的基本原理。
description.en: From the analysis of the spectrum of black-body radiation, the concept of quantization is introduced and the duality of matter and wave is also introduced. Combining the idea of quantization and the semi-classical hydrogen model of Bohr, the structure of atom is described. Solving the Schrodinger equation, the deduced wave function is related to the probability of finding the electron in space. The concept of atom is expanded to the molecular and the energy band theory of solid state physics. The energy band theory of solid state physics is applied to account the optical, electrical, and thermal properties of solid states, also the fundamental principles of semiconductors are introduced.

description.zh: 線性電路；電算放大器；二極體；非線性電路應用；接面場效電晶體（JFET）；金屬氧化物半導體場效電晶體(MOSFET) ；雙極性接面電晶體（BJT）；差動放大器；多級放大器。金氧半電晶體；雙接面電晶體；差動及多極放大器；功率放大器；頻率響應；回授；類比積體電路；濾波器；調諧放大器
description.en: frequency response,feedback and stability,differential and multistage amplifier,operational amplifier,analog integrated circuits.

description.zh: 基本儀器介紹；電子零件之認識；二極體電路（特性）；運算放大器；電晶體電路（特性）；A/D ，D/A 轉換器；類比乘法器。運算放大器應用；線性電壓調整器；電壓參考及電流源；電壓比較器；電壓控制振盪器；鎖相迴路；頻率－電壓轉換器；類比－數位轉換器；數位－類比轉換器；特殊裝置語言合成電路。
description.en: instrumentation, passive component,diode,transistor, operational amplifier,voltage regulator,voltage reference & current source, A/D & D/A converters,voltage controlled oscillator,PLL.

description.zh: 本課程介雷射之基本特性及雷射光在光學上的應用，內容包括雷射之時間與空間特性、雷射之模態、干涉、繞射、偏振及透鏡之各種像差等實驗。
description.en: This course introduces the fundamental characteristics of lasers and the applications of lasers in optics. It includes the experiments of the temporal and spatial characteristics of lasers, the mode distribution of lasers, interference, diffraction, and the abberations of lenses.

description.zh: (1)生醫與光學基礎(2)電子膠囊、內視鏡 (3)顯微鏡相關 (4)光學單離 (5)光學嵌住 (6)雷射美容治療相關 (7)光譜分析 (8)光動力治療、光觸媒法 (9)光學斷層掃描 (10)表面電漿子技術 (11)螢光光電檢測 (12)生物晶片(13)放射線影像
description.en:
(1) Basics of bio-optics (2) Optical measurement in Medical engineering
(3) Microscopy (4) Micro and nano technology in Laser capture microdissection (5) Laser trapping (6) Laser and skin effects
(7) Spectral technology (8) Photodynamic Therapy(PDT) and Photodynamic diagnosis(PDD) (9)Optical Coherence tomography
(10) Surface plasmons (11) Fluorescence sensing technology, spectroscopy and pharmacy analysis (12) Biochip Technology
(13) Bio-imaging

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 本課程以與學生日常生活相關的情境為主題，協助學生建立自然、流利的英語溝通技巧。語程側重訓練學生下列語言能力；(1)重音、縮音、連音、及語調等發音基礎訓練；(2)聆聽大意及特定資訊之能力；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式。本課程使用語言教室視聽器材實施教學。除聆聽錄音教材、配對練習、角色扮演、演說、表演短劇、及小組討論外，並佐以錄影教材，以加強實際演練與師生互動。
description.en:
